description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with FVB Energy. The average
  contract duration was 2.59 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $480.5K. The longest
  contract was 6.53 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.8M.
